summary: Sight and Sun learned of a patient privacy breach on May 17.  Patient names, Social Security numbers, addresses, medical record numbers, and other personal information may have been exposed.  An employee accessed and copied patients' electronic medical records without legitimate purpose.UDPATE (06/26/2013): A total of 9,000 patients were affected.  It appears that the records were accessed to target patients for other medical service offerings.

victim.victim_id: Gulf Breeze Family Eyecare (Sight and Sun Eyeworks Gulf Breeze)
